articles.title: Explosive Growth Ahead: Wearable Technology Market to Reach USD 152.82 Billion by 2029
articles.content: The global wearable technology market is expected to grow from $70.30 billion in 2024 to $152.82 billion by 2029, driven by the increasing adoption of next-generation displays, growing consumer preference for sleek devices, and the rising popularity of IoT and connected devices.

articles.title: Why Roblox Stock Was Hot With Investors This Week
articles.content: Roblox's stock has surged nearly 18% week-to-date, driven by a bullish analyst note and the company's recent announcement of discounts on its in-game currency. However, the author believes Roblox needs to demonstrate profitability to make its stock a compelling buy.

articles.title: Meet the Unstoppable Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock That Could Join Apple, Nvidia, and Microsoft in the $3 Trillion Club by 2028
articles.content: Meta Platforms (META) is poised to benefit greatly from its investments in AI, which could lead its stock to double in value and reach a $3 trillion market cap by 2028. AI is expected to drive increased engagement, improved monetization, and more efficient engineering at Meta.

articles.title: Hitachi 12-Month Performance Beats 6 Out Of 7 2023 Magnificent 7 Stocks
articles.content: Hitachi says renewables are the new power source, and it is focused on key issues needed for the rapid energy transition. Read why HTHIF stock is a Buy.

articles.title: 3 Stocks That Turned $1,000 Into $1 Million (or More)
articles.content: Looking at history, there are some dominant companies today that have compounded shareholder capital in a remarkable fashion.  In fact, here are three stocks that have turned a $1,000 initial investment into $1 million (or more).  Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN) is first on this list.

articles.title: Will Trump Save TikTok? Some Experts Have Their Doubts.
articles.content: The popular social media app TikTok may soon be banned in the U.S. following a Friday decision from a federal appeals court.
